name: American Film Convention
content: The American Film Convention is for film professionals from all corners of the industry-whether you&'e an actor, director, producer, tech expert, post-production professional, or exhibitor. This is your chance to connect, learn, and grow within the film space. This event is designed to serve and support the entire film industry and its community. Our convention is a groundbreaking event where you'll experience the first-ever film auction, the innovative Actors's Nest, and a large expo floor showcasing the latest in tech, post-production, and film exhibition. With conferences, keynote speakers, and a variety of connection-based events, there's something valuable for everyone. Here are some of our notable events: First-Ever Film Auction: A unique opportunity to buy and sell films. Actor's Nest: An innovative space for actors to network and collaborate. Tech Expo Floor: Featuring the latest advancements in film technology and post-production. Industry Conferences: Insightful sessions with leading experts discussing current trends and future directions. Keynote Speakers: Hear from industry luminaries sharing their experiences and vision. Networking Events: Connect with professionals across all sectors of the film industry. More information can be found at americanfilmconvention.com.
